markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greenwatch Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=4053) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 129</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16)

</column>

---

You've received the basic training developed for all Greenwatch recruits. You become an expert in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) and gain the [Experienced Tracker](/Feats.aspx?ID=780) and [Survey Wildlife](/Feats.aspx?ID=849) skill feats.

<title level="2">Greenwatch Initiate leads to...</title>
[Defy Fey](/Feats.aspx?ID=4054), [Fey Tracker](/Feats.aspx?ID=4055)
name: Greenwatch Initiate
